price: 7. Iyagoo arag dulleysan, waxay ka soo baxayaan qubuurahooda iyagoo la moodo ayax faafay.
arabic: خُشَّعًا أَبۡصَٰرُهُمۡ يَخۡرُجُونَ مِنَ ٱلۡأَجۡدَاثِ كَأَنَّهُمۡ جَرَادٞ مُّنتَشِرٞ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: khushaʿan abṣāruhum yakhrujūna mina al-ajdāthi ka-annahum jarādun muntashirun
